overview: Released by Telegames UK in 1990 for sale on VHS from their mail order store. It showcased the best games available (at the time) for the current games consoles (at the time) such as the Sega Master System, Nintendo Entertainment System, Colecovision, Intellivision and many more. It even has footage of the abandoned Konix Multisystem which would have been the first UK made console. The video box claims it has 'Over 400 games shown'.
title: What Video Game?
